title: (x) Acne Jeans 70s serif face - Times Modern {Marten F}
content:
Hi —

Wondered if anyone could id this for me?

Thanks

P

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025200515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Acne_4507.jpg)
author: alphapeta

comments.content:
That's a modified Times Modern Black...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025200515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/acnejeans_process01_4203.jpg)

Since you only wondered about the Acne part and it's the J thats been modified the correct answer I think is [Times Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025200515/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/times_modern/)...

Sorry! My mistake. It's not a straight up Times Modern. That's all over customized...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025200515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Acne_again_3549.jpg)
Yes it was drawn for Acne but I recognised the typeface. And should have known it myself. Thank you. Very much!
